Address.label: Address
Address.value: GIBOREI ISRAEL 7,RE'EM INDUSTRIAL PARK, NETANYA, 4250407, Israel

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: TAT Technologies Ltd is a provider of solutions and services to the aerospace and defence industries focused mainly on the four segments: Original equipment manufacturing (OEM); MRO services for heat transfer; MRO services for aviation components; Overhaul and coating of jet engine components. The company design, develop and manufacture Heat Exchangers, Cooling Systems, Cold Plates, Vapor-Cycle Air Conditioning Systems (for both land and airborne applications) and flow accessories.
